2. "The Matrix" (1999) - This iconic movie introduces viewers to a world where reality is not what it seems, and the line between humans and machines is blurred.

4. "Interstellar" (2014) - This visually stunning movie follows a team of astronauts as they travel through wormholes in search of a new home for humanity.
5. "Arrival" (2016) - This thought-provoking movie explores the concept of time and language, as a linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with aliens who have landed on Earth.
